channel.title: Comments for Wilderness Survival Product Reviews
channel.description: Independent reviews of products in the survival, prepping, homesteading, outdoors, gardening realms.

item.title: Comment on The Unexpected Benefits of a Bullet Proof Vest by Michael Case
item.dc:creator: Michael Case
item.description: Great article about how a safety vest works, I do believe that if you are working as a security personnel in any capacity you should have your won't vest. Be it bullet proof or just a stab proof vest, will one day save your life.
item.content:encoded: Great article about how a safety vest works, I do believe that if you are working as a security personnel in any capacity you should have your won’t vest. Be it bullet proof or just a stab proof vest, will one day save your life.

item.title: Comment on The Value of a Tactical Vest by Michael Case
item.dc:creator: Michael Case
item.description: A tactical vest or even a concealed vest is essential if you are working as a security personnel. In fact, even the VIP's they are protecting should wear a concealed one because their lives depend on it. I must agree that Jack Bauer in a tactical vest looks really cool and functional at the same time.
item.content:encoded: A tactical vest or even a concealed vest is essential if you are working as a security personnel. In fact, even the VIP’s they are protecting should wear a concealed one because their lives depend on it. I must agree that Jack Bauer in a tactical vest looks really cool and functional at the same time.

item.title: Comment on SafeGuard’s Stealth Body Armor Kevlar Vest Review by Michael Case
item.dc:creator: Michael Case
item.description: Got one of their vests and their definitely have a great product. Its really well built and looks like it will last a very long time.
item.content:encoded: Got one of their vests and their definitely have a great product. Its really well built and looks like it will last a very long time.

item.title: Comment on Book Review: The Weekend Homesteader by Miriam Lovelace
item.dc:creator: Miriam Lovelace
item.description: I have read this book and it is a great addition to my collection of prepper books. I personally want to be able to live off my own plants. That way I can get to eat organically. I have already started my own small tomato garden at the back of my house because I love doing salsa. When you start growing your own food there is no substitute for it.
item.content:encoded: I have read this book and it is a great addition to my collection of prepper books. I personally want to be able to live off my own plants. That way I can get to eat organically. I have already started my own small tomato garden at the back of my house because I love doing salsa. When you start growing your own food there is no substitute for it.
